MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA18 area of Cumnock, affecting properties in Afton Road and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9:57am due to reports of a grounded overhead electricity line near Black Craig Farm and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midday. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:58am on Sunday, 27 December 2020
